Package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.core.serialization.registry

Interface DeserializerRegistry<S>

Type Parameters:
S - a type of objects to deserialize
public sealed interface DeserializerRegistry<S>
A registry that manages Deserializers.

The implementations of this interface are thread-safe.

    • create

      Creates a new DeserializerRegistry.
      Type Parameters:

    • empty

      @NotNull static <S> @NotNull DeserializerRegistry<S> empty()
      Returns an empty DeserializerRegistry.

      The returning DeserializerRegistry is frozen.

      Type Parameters:
      S - a type of objects to deserialize
      Returns:
      an empty DeserializerRegistry

    • get

      Gets the Deserializer associated with the specified class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - a type of object after deserialization
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class to get Deserializer
      Returns:
      the Deserializer associated with the specified class, or null

    • register

      @Contract("_, _ -> this") @NotNull <T> @NotNull DeserializerRegistry<S> register(@NotNull @NotNull Class<T> clazz, @NotNull @NotNull Deserializer<? super S,? extends T> deserializer)
      Registers Deserializer.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      clazz - a class to associate Deserializer with

    • registerAll

      @Contract("_ -> this") @NotNull @NotNull DeserializerRegistry<S> registerAll(@NotNull @NotNull DeserializerRegistry<S> registry)
      Registers Deserializers in the given DeserializerRegistry.
      Parameters:
      registry - a DeserializerRegistry that contains Deserializers to register
      Returns:
      this DeserializerRegistry instance

    • freeze

      @Contract("-> this") @NotNull @NotNull DeserializerRegistry<S> freeze()
      Freezes this DeserializerRegistry.

      After calling this method, register(Class, Deserializer) and registerAll(DeserializerRegistry) will throw IllegalStateException.

      This method can be called multiple times.

      Returns:
      this DeserializerRegistry instance

    • isFrozen

      boolean isFrozen()
      Checks if this DeserializerRegistry is frozen.
      Returns:
      true if this DeserializerRegistry is frozen, otherwise false
